width and height.back:
(box model)
width -
distance from left inner edge to right iner edge
height -
inner top edge to inner bottom edge

note: this properties do not apply to inline nonreplace elements

margin.back:
margin -
separation between most normal-flow elements occurs because of margins.

h1 {margin: 0.25in; background-color: silver;}
sets a quarter inch of blank space around an h1 element

margins and inline elements.back:
applying margins to an inline nonreplaced element will have no effect on the line-height
only left and right margins are effected

border.back:
border -
simply one or more lines that surround the content and padding of an element.
Three attributes: width, style, color.

border-color.back:
p {border-style: solid; border-color: gray;}
 h1 {border-style: solid; border-color: black rgb(25%,25%,25%,25%) #808080 silver;}

shorthand border properties.back:
h1 {border-bottom: thick solid gray;}
h2 {border: thick silver solid; border-left-width: 20px;}
